revised_title: Finite Element Method Applications in Geology and Geophysics
tldr: The author discusses the application of the finite element method to geological and geophysical problems. The finite element method is a powerful tool for solving problems in continuum mechanics and has been applied to various fields, including geology and geotechnical engineering. The author outlines the general mathematical and practical aspects of the method and surveys its accomplishments in geology and geophysics. They also suggest possible new extensions of application.
